subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
Relocation of Business
lead_paragraph: Lew Wolff, the owner of the Oakland Athletics, said his team needed a new stadium in San Jose, Calif., to keep the club above baseball’s poverty line.
snippet: Lew Wolff, the owner of the Oakland Athletics, said his team needed a new stadium in San Jose, Calif., to keep the club above baseball’s poverty line.
